name: Out of Shapes
description: Embark on a mesmerizing journey of shape manipulation and precision in "Out Of Shapes," the ultimate puzzle game that will test your stacking skills and creativity. In this simple and straightforward game, your objective is to drop various geometric shapes onto one another, creating larger and more complex formations. The goal is simple: the more shapes you successfully combine in a single drop, the higher your combo score. However, beware of letting any shape touch the critical line at the top, as it will spell the end of your adventure.
